main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Portland, Oregon on April 6, 1957, involving a very bright object with a loud whistling noise traveling at high speeds.
interesting points: The object was described as moving at an estimated speed of 200-300 knots,The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object was seen while numerous aircraft were in the area,The sighting may have been connected to a weather balloon released earlier that day,Another report indicated a similar sighting from a government observer in Shelton, Washington.
sighted object: a very bright object resembling a buzz bomb
witness description: the sighting was observed with a visual confirmation while numerous aircraft were in proximity
